Class AbstractShape

java.lang.Object
  de.weltraumschaf.jebnf.gfx.shapes.AbstractShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
Paintable, Shape
Direct Known Subclasses:

public abstract class AbstractShape
extends Object
implements Shape

Common functionality of shapes.

Author:
Sven Strittmatter

setDebug

public void setDebug(boolean onOff)
Description copied from interface: Shape
Enables/disable debug paintings. By default debugging should be off. Debug painting means that the shape paints some additional helper pixels for debugging.

Specified by:

Parameters:
onOff - Whether to set debug painting on or off.
